::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus: Well... What was that Earth phrase that Spike told me so long ago? "When it rains it pours." I think that was it. If things are going to slag they might as well all go at once.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  Windlord
 
 "More problems"muttered the male

 > 
 > Rodimus: We wait for the briefing and figure out a way to deal with 
 this Decepticon on top of the Predacons and Unicron problems we 
 already had. I'm most interested to hear the news Kup brings from 
 Cybertron.
 > 
 > Kup: You won't really like it, lad. Nightlight and Windlord heard a 
 bit on the flight here. It's best that I go into full detail once 
 with everyone.
